mapper.select: SELECT province_id, city_id, case when sum(merchant_recharge_balance) is null then 0 else sum(merchant_recharge_balance) end merchant_recharge_balance, case when sum(merchant_recharge_point) is null then 0 else sum(merchant_recharge_point) end merchant_recharge_point, case when sum(member_recharge_balance) is null then 0 else sum(member_recharge_balance) end member_recharge_balance, case when sum(member_recharge_point) is null then 0 else sum(member_recharge_point) end member_recharge_point FROM report_area_recharge_month WHERE city_id = ${cityId} AND gmt_report BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY province_id,city_id
